member.name: T:Ecomm.Lib.WebApi.ResponseWrapper.WrapIgnore
member.summary: Apply this attribute on routes that you don't want to be wrapped

member.name: P:Ecomm.Lib.WebApi.ResponseWrapper.WrapperOptions.ApiVersion
member.summary: Sets the Api version to be shown in the response. You must set the ShowApiVersion to true to see this value in the response.

member.name: P:Ecomm.Lib.WebApi.ResponseWrapper.WrapperOptions.IsDebug
member.summary: Shows the stack trace information in the responseException details.

member.name: P:Ecomm.Lib.WebApi.ResponseWrapper.WrapperOptions.ShowApiVersion
member.summary: Shows the Api Version attribute in the response.

member.name: P:Ecomm.Lib.WebApi.ResponseWrapper.WrapperOptions.IgnoreNullValue
member.summary: Tells the wrapper to ignore attributes with null values. Default is true.

member.name: P:Ecomm.Lib.WebApi.ResponseWrapper.WrapperOptions.UseCamelCaseNamingStrategy
member.summary: Tells the wrapper to use camel case as the response format. Default is true.

member.name: P:Ecomm.Lib.WebApi.ResponseWrapper.WrapperOptions.EnableRequestLogging
member.summary: Enables request logging and performance metrics
